description: Try our easy to follow Veal Schnitzels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Schnitzel,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Rice,Veal,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Veal Schnitzels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Break rice cakes into a food processor. Add oregano and paprika and process until crumbs form. Transfer mixture to a plate. Place flour on a separate plate and season with salt and pepper. Break eggs into a bowl and whisk lightly.
Coat veal in flour, dip into egg and press on crumbs to completely coat. Chill for 10 minutes.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook veal, in two batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Serve with salad and lemon.
